header.title: wxHtmlLinkEvent

description.p: This event class is used for the events generated by wxHtmlWindow.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxCommandEvent wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxHtmlLinkEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Returns the wx_wxHtmlLinkInfo() which contains info about the cell clicked and the hyperlink it contains.

desc.p: Returns the wx_wxHtmlLinkInfo() which contains info about the cell clicked and the hyperlink it contains.
